hubble_space_telescope.name: Hubble Space Telescope
hubble_space_telescope.description: A space telescope that was launched into low Earth orbit in 1990 and remains in operation.

international_space_station.name: International Space Station
international_space_station.description: A space station, or a habitable artificial satellite, in low Earth orbit.

terra.name: Terra
terra.description: A multi-national NASA scientific research satellite in a Sun-synchronous orbit around the Earth.

aqua.name: Aqua
aqua.description: A NASA scientific research satellite launched in 2002 to monitor the water cycle.

landsat_8.name: Landsat 8
landsat_8.description: An American Earth observation satellite launched in 2013 as part of the Landsat program.
